programme.title: The Year of Living Dangerously
programme.desc: A reporter suddenly rockets to importance after he gains access to inside information about a coup.

programme.title: Dreamcatcher
programme.desc: Telepathic friends confront aliens that are being hunted by the military.

programme.title: Palmetto
programme.desc: A parolee becomes entangled in an ill-fated kidnapping scheme when he returns home from prison.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Academy Award-winners Warren Beatty and Annette Bening star in a romantic tale of lovers torn apart by fate.

programme.title: Guilty by Suspicion
programme.desc: A film director faces the House Committee on Un-American Activities and political turmoil in 1950s America.

programme.title: 8 Seconds
programme.desc: A riveting drama about an Oklahoma boy's meteoric rise to fame as a champion bull-rider.

programme.title: Graffiti Bridge
programme.desc: In this spiritual sequel to Purple Rain, Prince struggles for musical control of a nightclub.

programme.title: Ladyhawke
programme.desc: Two lovers, cursed to live together yet apart as hawk and wolf, battle the evil bishop who transformed them.

programme.title: Alex & Emma
programme.desc: To complete his novel and pay debts, Alex hires Emma as a stenographer. Soon, love develops between them.

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: To win a woman's heart, Dylan kidnaps her terrier with plans to "find" the dog and convince her to date him.

programme.title: Me and Orson Welles
programme.desc: New York, 1937. Richard (Zac Efron) lucks into a starring role in Orson Welles's production of Julius Caesar.

programme.title: The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
programme.desc: This comedy prequel contains wild car chases and crashes, Daisy's hilarious hijinks, and a bevy of laughs.
